section.name: Introduction
section.p: This guide starts with an architectural overview of Loom. Then, we identify the different roles that typically exist in daily use of Loom. For each of these, we provide a basic guide. We finish with a complete example.

subsection.name: Target Audience
subsection.p: This documentation is aimed towards people who:

ul.li: wish to create applications that run within Loom
wish to create components (blocks) for use within Loom
wish to setup and administer Loom
are interested in the design principles of Loom
wish to develop code that will be incorporated into Loom
wish to reuse Loom concepts in their own application
